attributes.action: No more Mosques to be built in the UK until Muslims Countries allow the same freedom to other religions.
attributes.additional_details: No more Mosques to be built in the UK until Muslims Countries allow the same freedom to other religions. Religious freedom in the UK is allowing this country to be overrun by Muslims who are not interested in becoming British, subject to British laws, therefore they should not be allowed to spread their poison when they reject teh same freedoms in their own countries.
